title: A Wordle-inspired game called Waffle has become more popular than actual waffles
description: At least according to search engine results.

title: Diablo 4's best Barbarian build has been killed by a bug fix
description: Hammer of the Ancient doesn't hit like it used to.

title: Diablo 4 just got 6 new Uniques and 7 new Legendary Aspects: here's what they all are
description: One is an Uber Unique spear that gives you random Shrine effects after you kill Elites.

title: Despite $500,000 win against abusive 'fan,' Destiny 2 developers are still being harassed 'just because they work at Bungie'
description: Bungie warned Destiny fans not to expect increased interactions with its community team anytime soon.

title: Cozy community MMO Palia turns fishing and cooking into co-op activities
description: You can do them alone, but they look far more fun with friends.

title: Diablo 4's latest patch kicks its weakest class while it's down
description: Sorcerers can't win.

title: GTA-themed 'Cluckin' Bell' pop-up restaurant catches cease and desist from Take Two, so they're renaming it 'Don't Cluckin' Tell'
description: A real-life Cluckin' Bell appeared at Comic Con last year, but plans to bring it back for 2023 have run up against a letter from Take-Two's lawyers.

title: The 16GB Nvidia RTX 4060 Ti is one of the most cynical graphics cards ever, and I'm kinda here for it
description: Theoretically the latest Ada graphics card launched today, but good luck finding one. If you really wanted an expensive 16GB RTX 4060 Ti anyways.

title: A Diablo 4 hero-scientist has tested every single dungeon to tell you which one you should grind
description: Get the man a Nobel.

title: Activision all-but-confirms Modern Warfare 3 will let players carry over their hard-won loot from its predecessor
description: The official Call of Duty Twitter posted a "poll" with only one real answer.

title: Welcome to the strange world of custom RTX 4060 GPUs
description: We've been seeing a lot of experimentation around Nvidia's new RTX 4060 cards, here's why.

title: One of the biggest upgrades to texture load times in years just debuted in a free Portal mod
description: GPU decompression is here, and you can try it for free with RTX IO in Portal: Prelude.

title: Counter-Strike 2 adds Wingman mode and 'our first overhauled map'
description: Overpass has had one heck of a shine-up.

title: Google celebrates 45 years of Space Invaders with an AR game that's actually kinda awesome?
description: And it's slapped-together a little mini-history of the series too.

title: UK games industry unveils 11-point plan to self-regulate around loot boxes, increase transparency, and keep them away from kids
description: UKIE's 11 principles are meant to deal with the industry's loot box issues without getting the government involved.

title: UK's NHS clinic for 'gaming disorders' claims unexpectedly high patient numbers in early years, with some 'referring themselves'
description: The 'The National Centre for Gaming Disorders' has been in operation for around three years.

title: 5 tips for getting started in the Jagged Alliance 3 campaign
description: The campaign to reclaim Grand Chien can be unforgiving to the ill-informed.

title: I'm quitting my job to sell adorable stickers on the internet
description: Sticky Business has me dreaming of life as an Etsy entrepreneur.

title: Drop says the world will find it easier to buy cool keycaps and headphones now it's owned by Corsair
description: Drop now has some serious sway as part of the Corsair family.

title: After 2 years away, dev realises no one liked his game and promises a free remaster to make up for it: 'I hope it will go some way to rectify mistakes we have made'
description: The Steam reviews on Grey Skies: A War of the Worlds Story went from bad to worse while its lead dev was distracted by his personal life.

title: Logitech wants what Elgato has: buys desktop controller maker Loupedeck
description: Razer appears likely to be cut out of future collaboration with Loupedeck as a result of the acquisition, however.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 has '17,000' variations on its ending, a number that gives me a headache just thinking about it
description: 'Oh no they found the 17,000 number'

title: Stardew Valley's newest update is looking bigger than we initially thought
description: 1.6 will still be significantly smaller than 1.5, but it's looking pretty mighty.

title: Salad Fingers creator is making a bizarre side-scroller beat'em up, which will be priced at 'a fiver or something'
description: David Firth's work-in-progress looks like something that crawled out of a 2010 flash game website.

title: Haptic suits give deaf concertgoers a way to experience music again
description: Feel it.

title: Samsung's 3nm process is shaping up very nicely, and that's good news for gamers
description: More capacity should lead to cheaper chips.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #759: Tuesday, July 18
description: Trouble solving today's Wordle? Here's the help you need.
